query.query: {"measures":[["avg","Activity"]],"pigql":"q = load \"<ServiceActivity>\"; q = filter q by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'Current')))}}; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate count() / unique('Case.Account.Name')  as 'avg_Activity';","autoFilter":true}

{"measures":[["avg","CSAT",null,{"display":" "}]],"pigql":"q = load \"<ServiceCase>\"; q = filter q by 'CSAT' >= -10; q = filter q by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'Current')))}}; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == \"true\"; q = filter q by 'Origin' in {{selection(count_cases_by_orign)}}; q = filter q by 'Priority' in {{selection(count_case_by_priority)}}; q = filter q by 'MilestoneStatus' in {{selection(SLA_Select)}}; q = filter q by 'RecordType.Name' in {{selection(filter_recordtype)}}; q = filter q by 'IsEscalated' in {{selection(filter_escalated)}}; q = filter q by 'Reason' in {{selection(count_cases_by_reason)}}; q = filter q by 'Product_Name__c' in {{selection(count_case_by_product)}}; q = filter q by 'Type' in {{selection(filter_type)}}; r = filter q by 'Account.Name' in {{selection(filter_account)}}; r = group r by {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'GroupbyCreatedDate__c')))}}; r = foreach r generate {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'GenerateCreatedDate__c')))}}, avg('CSAT') as 'avg_CSAT', (case when \"{{no_quote(value(selection(filter_account)))}}\" == \"all\" then \"ALL\" else \"Selected Accounts\" end) as 'Performance'; s = group q by {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'GroupbyCreatedDate__c')))}}; s = foreach s generate {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'GenerateCreatedDate__c')))}},  avg('CSAT') as 'avg_CSAT', \"All Accounts\" as 'Performance'; u = union s, r; u = filter u by 'Performance' != \"ALL\";","groups":["{{(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'compactGroup')))}}","Performance"]}

{"measures":[["perc","Percent"]],"pigql":"q = load \"<ServiceCase>\"; r = filter q by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'LastPeriodCompare')))}}; s = filter q by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'Current')))}}; t = group r by all, s by all; t = foreach t generate 100*(count(s)-count(r))/count(r) as 'perc_Percent';","autoFilter":true}

Time_Selection.start: [[{"Backlog30DayClose":"[\"current day - 240 days\"..\"current day - 180 days\"]","BacklogCompare":"[\"current day - 180 days\"..\"current day\"]","CoGroup":"('CreatedDate__c_Month')","Compact":[["day",-180],["day",0]],"Current":"[\"180 days ago\"..\"current day\"]","GenerateActivityCreatedDate__c":"(case when count(s) > 0 then s['CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month'] else sevent['CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month'] end) as 'CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month'","GenerateClosedDate":"'ClosedDate_Year'+\"~~~\"+'ClosedDate_Month' as 'CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month'","GenerateCoGroupDate":"created['CreatedDate__c_Year']+\"~~~\"+created['CreatedDate__c_Month'] as 'CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month'","GenerateCreatedDate__c":"'CreatedDate__c_Year'+\"~~~\"+'CreatedDate__c_Month' as 'CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month'","GenerateSelectedActivityCreatedDate__c":"(case when count(r) > 0 then r['CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month'] else revent['CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month'] end) as 'CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month'","GroupbyClosedDate":"('ClosedDate_Year','ClosedDate_Month')","GroupbyCreatedDate__c":"('CreatedDate__c_Year','CreatedDate__c_Month')","GroupbyCreatedDate__cAccount":"('CreatedDate__c_Year','CreatedDate__c_Month','Case.Account.Name')","GroupbyCreatedDate__cEvent":"('EventSubtype','CreatedDate__c_Year','CreatedDate__c_Month')","GroupbyCreatedDate__cTask":"('CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month','Performance')","Grouping":"CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month","LastPeriodCompare":"[\"180 days ago - 180 days\"..\"current day - 180 days\"]","LastYearCompare":"[\"180 days ago - 1 year\"..\"current day - 1 year\"]","compactGroup":["CreatedDate__c_Year","CreatedDate__c_Month"],"filter":"month","queryCogroupNew":"first(ThisYear['CreatedDate__c_Year'])+\"~~~\"+ThisYear['CreatedDate__c_Month'] as 'CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month'"}]]

query.query: {"measures":[["count","*",null,{"display":" "}]],"pigql":"q = load \"<ServiceActivity>\";  q = filter q by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'Current')))}};r = filter q by 'Case.Account.Name' in {{selection(filter_account)}}; r = group r by {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'GroupbyCreatedDate__c')))}}; r = foreach r generate {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'GenerateCreatedDate__c')))}}, count() as 'count', (case when (\"{{no_quote(value(selection(filter_account)))}}\" == \"all\") then \"ALL\" else \"Selected Accounts\" end) as 'Performance'; s = group q by {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'GroupbyCreatedDate__c')))}}; s = foreach s generate {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'GenerateCreatedDate__c')))}}, count() / unique('Case.Account.Name') as 'count', \"All Accounts\" as 'Performance'; u = union r, s; u = filter u by 'Performance' != \"ALL\";","autoFilter":true,"groups":["{{(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'compactGroup')))}}","Performance"]}

{"measures":[["avg","Case.Duration__c",null,{"display":"Avg Duration"}]],"pigql":"q = load \"<ServiceCaseHistory>\"; q = filter q by 'ChangeAfterCloseDate' == \"false\"; q = filter q by 'Field' == \"Status\"; average = filter q by 'Case.Product_Name__c' in {{selection(count_case_by_product)}}; average = filter average by 'Case.Reason' in {{selection(count_cases_by_reason)}}; average = filter average by 'Case.Type' in {{selection(filter_type)}}; average = filter average by 'Case.RecordType.Name' in {{selection(filter_recordtype)}}; average = filter average by 'Case.IsEscalated' in {{selection(filter_escalated)}}; average = filter average by 'Case.MilestoneStatus' in {{selection(SLA_Select)}}; average = filter average by 'Case.Priority' in {{selection(count_case_by_priority)}}; average = filter average by 'Case.Origin' in {{selection(count_cases_by_orign)}}; averageOld = group average by 'OldValue__c'; averageOld = foreach averageOld generate 'OldValue__c' as 'Status', avg(DateDiffOld) as 'Case.Duration__c'; averageNew = filter average by 'IsLastChange' == \"true\"; averageNew = group averageNew by 'NewValue__c'; averageNew = foreach averageNew generate 'NewValue__c' as 'Status', avg(DateDiffNew) as 'Case.Duration__c'; averageTotal = union averageOld,averageNew; averageTotal = group averageTotal by 'Status'; averageTotal = foreach averageTotal generate 'Status' as 'Status', \"All Accounts\" as 'Performance', avg('Case.Duration__c') as 'avg_Case.Duration__c'; averageAccount = filter average by 'Case.Account.Name' in {{selection(filter_account)}}; averageAccountOld = group averageAccount by 'OldValue__c'; averageAccountOld = foreach averageAccountOld generate 'OldValue__c' as 'Status', avg(DateDiffOld) as 'Case.Duration__c'; averageAccountNew = filter averageAccount by 'IsLastChange' == \"true\"; averageAccountNew = group averageAccountNew by 'NewValue__c'; averageAccountNew = foreach averageAccountNew generate 'NewValue__c' as 'Status', avg(DateDiffNew) as 'Case.Duration__c'; averageAccountTotal = union averageAccountOld,averageAccountNew; averageAccountTotal = group averageAccountTotal by 'Status'; averageAccountTotal = foreach averageAccountTotal generate 'Status' as 'Status', (case when \"{{no_quote(value(selection(filter_account)))}}\" == \"all\" then \"ALL\" else \"Selected Accounts\" end) as 'Performance', avg('Case.Duration__c') as 'avg_Case.Duration__c'; FinalChart = union averageTotal, averageAccountTotal; FinalChart = filter FinalChart by 'Performance' != \"ALL\"; FinalChart = order FinalChart by 'avg_Case.Duration__c' desc;","autoFilter":true,"groups":["Status","Performance"]}

{"measures":[["perc","Percent"]],"pigql":"q = load \"<ServiceCase>\"; r = filter q by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'LastYearCompare')))}}; s = filter q by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'Current')))}}; t = group r by all, s by all; t = foreach t generate 100*(count(s)-count(r))/count(r) as 'perc_Percent';","autoFilter":true}

{"measures":[["avg","Duration"]],"pigql":"q = load \"<ServiceCase>\"; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == \"true\"; q = filter q by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'Current')))}}; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate avg('{{no_quote(value(selection(Static_Duration)))}}') as 'avg_Duration';","autoFilter":true,"filters":[["CreatedDate__c",["{{value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'Compact'))}}"]],["IsClosed",["true"],"in"]]}

{"measures":[["perc","Percent"]],"pigql":"q = load \"<ServiceActivity>\"; q = filter q by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'Current')))}};  r = filter q  by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'LastYearCompare')))}}; s = filter q by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'Current')))}}; t = group r by all, s by all; t = foreach t generate 100*(count(s)-count(r))/count(r) as 'perc_Percent';","autoFilter":true}

{"measures":[["perc","Percent"]],"pigql":"q = load \"<ServiceActivity>\"; q = filter q by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'Current')))}};  r = filter q  by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'LastPeriodCompare')))}}; s = filter q by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'Current')))}}; t = group r by all, s by all; t = foreach t generate 100*(count(s)-count(r))/count(r) as 'perc_Percent';","autoFilter":true}

{"measures":[["avg","Duration",null,{"display":" "}]],"pigql":"q = load \"<ServiceCase>\"; q = filter q by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'Current')))}}; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == \"true\"; q = filter q by 'Origin' in {{selection(count_cases_by_orign)}}; q = filter q by 'Priority' in {{selection(count_case_by_priority)}}; q = filter q by 'MilestoneStatus' in {{selection(SLA_Select)}}; q = filter q by 'RecordType.Name' in {{selection(filter_recordtype)}}; q = filter q by 'IsEscalated' in {{selection(filter_escalated)}}; q = filter q by 'Reason' in {{selection(count_cases_by_reason)}}; q = filter q by 'Product_Name__c' in {{selection(count_case_by_product)}};  q = filter q by 'Type' in {{selection(filter_type)}}; r = filter q by 'Account.Name' in {{selection(filter_account)}}; r = group r by {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'GroupbyCreatedDate__c')))}}; r = foreach r generate {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'GenerateCreatedDate__c')))}}, avg('{{no_quote(value(selection(Static_Duration)))}}') as 'avg_Duration', (case when \"{{no_quote(value(selection(filter_account)))}}\" == \"all\" then \"ALL\" else \"Selected Accounts\" end) as 'Performance'; s = group q by {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'GroupbyCreatedDate__c')))}}; s = foreach s generate {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'GenerateCreatedDate__c')))}},  avg('{{no_quote(value(selection(Static_Duration)))}}') as 'avg_Duration', \"All Accounts\" as 'Performance'; u = union s, r; u = filter u by 'Performance' != \"ALL\";","groups":["{{(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'compactGroup')))}}","Performance"]}

{"measures":[["perc","Percent"]],"pigql":"q = load \"<ServiceCase>\"; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == \"true\"; r = filter q by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'LastPeriodCompare')))}}; s = filter q by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'Current')))}}; t = group r by all, s by all; t = foreach t generate 100*(avg(s.'{{no_quote(value(selection(Static_Duration)))}}')-avg(r.'{{no_quote(value(selection(Static_Duration)))}}'))/avg(r.'{{no_quote(value(selection(Static_Duration)))}}') as 'perc_Percent';","autoFilter":true}

{"measures":[["perc","Percent"]],"pigql":"q = load \"<ServiceCase>\"; q = filter q by 'CSAT' >= -10; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == \"true\"; r = filter q by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'LastYearCompare')))}}; s = filter q by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'Current')))}}; t = group r by all, s by all; t = foreach t generate 100*(avg(s.'CSAT')-avg(r.'CSAT'))/avg(r.'CSAT') as 'perc_Percent';","autoFilter":true}
